group_1.textLeft: Isabeau's Soul Gem gave birth
to the fearsome Witch "Crépuscule de la Reine"@right before the eyes of her daughters.
It seemed as if your plan had succeeded, Cube.
What you didn't expect
was for Lapin to have her wish granted right then.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I was surprised that Isabeau still had her@powers, albeit incomplete.
I didn't think that Lapin would have made a wish@like that, either.

group_1.textLeft: As a result of that girl's wish,
Isabeau's human body remained...@but it was a husk of her former self,
filled only by the malicious soul of a Witch.
So now, a Witch is seeking to engulf France...@and all of Europe.
All that remains for the people
is a living nightmare...

group_1.textRight: Exactly.
The woman known as "Queen Isabeau"@is merely a Witch's puppet now.
She's a hollow doll of the Magical Girl she used to be.

group_1.textLeft: You're talking about this as if it were someone else's@fault.
This is a crisis caused by your miscalculation,@you know...

group_1.textRight: ...The trouble is, even with her being an empty shell,
she's still creating yet more Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: All three of her adopted daughters@became Magical Girls, too.
An existence driven only by her lust for power,
Hell given form, with an ever-growing procession@of Magical Girls...
If Isabeau continues to run rampant,@this will spell the end for mankind.

group_1.textRight: I can't afford to let that happen.
Of course... Mother...

group_1.textLeft: Did she say anything?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
Our next target shall be Orléans.

group_1.textLeft: Finally.
We're gonna have sooo much fun!

group_1.textRight: Indeed... However, we mustn't rush it.
First, I must ask you to support the English army
as it moves south from Normandy...

group_1.textLeft: ...Understood.

group_1.textRight: Lapin, please fight alongside the English army.

group_1.textLeft: What about you, Minou?

group_1.textRight: There are a few...rebellious villages along the way.
I have been tasked with sowing a bit of strife...

group_1.textLeft: Using Grief Seeds, right?

group_1.textRight: Precisely.

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: Nothing serious... I was simply thinking
that perhaps these girls would like some new friends.

group_1.textLeft: Hm...

group_1.textRight: Though it may take some time to find suitable@candidates,
as there are a limited number of girls@with the right qualities...
